title: Bug 6009: New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using build 20011106 and having a .java file open in the editor, clicking the new class button does not default the 'Enclosing Type' field to the current type in the editor.
EB: The 'Enclosing Type' field should default to the current type in the editor when a .java file is open and the new class button is clicked.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a .java file in the editor. 2. Click the new class button. 3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' field, it will be blank instead of being auto-filled with the current type in the editor.
